success_criteria: Linters (Flake8, Black) pass; Unit test suite passes; Code coverage for new code > 80% (REQ-1-504).
business_impact: Prevents low-quality code and regressions from entering the main branch.

success_criteria: Automated E2E smoke test suite (covering login, create trip) passes.
failure_action: Trigger high-priority alert to DevOps/QA team; Automatically roll back deployment.
business_impact: Prevents a broken build from blocking QA and UAT activities.

trigger_event: Manual trigger before a production release candidate is finalized
success_criteria: No new 'Critical' or 'High' vulnerabilities detected by SAST and container scans.
failure_action: Block production release; Create high-priority tickets for security team.
escalation_procedure: Report to CTO and Engineering Manager.
business_impact: Prevents known security vulnerabilities from being deployed to production.

success_criteria: UAT sign-off from all stakeholders; Performance benchmarks met; Successful DR drill completed; Data migration dry-run validated and signed-off.
tools_used: UAT Checklists, Performance Reports, DR Drill Report
business_impact: Final go/no-go decision for launching the system to production.
